meanings.definition: Coming before all others in time or order; earliest; 2. The first occurrence of something; 3. The first in a sequence of items.
meanings.sent1: The firsts snowflakes of winter gently fell from the sky.
meanings.sent2: She won the firsts prize in the art competition.
meanings.sent3: The firsts pancake she made was a lopsided disaster.
meanings.sent4: His firsts attempt at surfing left him battered by the waves.
meanings.sent5: The firsts light of dawn painted the sky in hues of pink and gold.
